section.title: File Definition
section.p: A file is considered to be a DocBook 5 document when the namespace is http://docbook.org/ns/docbook.

section.title: Default Document Templates
section.p: There are a variety of default DocBook 5 templates available when creating new documents from templatesnew documents from templates, including Article, Book, Chapter, Glossary, Section, and more.

The default templates for DocBook 5 documents are located in the /frameworks/docbook/templates/Docbook 5 folder.Default templates for experimental DocBook 5.1 documents are also available in the /frameworks/docbook/templates/Docbook 5.1 (Experimental)/ directory.

section.title: Default Schema
section.p: The default schema that is used if one is not detected in the DocBook 5 file is docbookxi.rng and it is stored in /frameworks/docbook/5.0/rng/. Other types of schemas are also located in various folders inside the /frameworks/docbook/5.0/ directory (for example, XML Schema files are located in the xsd folder).

section.title: Default CSS
section.p: The default CSS files used for rendering DocBook content in Author mode is stored in /frameworks/docbook/css/.
By default, these default CSS files are merged with any that are specified in the document. For more information, see .

section.title: Default XML Catalog
section.p: The default XML catalog, catalog.xml, is stored in /frameworks/docbook/5.0/.
section.note: A default XML catalog and schema files for experimental DocBook 5.1 documents are also available in the /frameworks/docbook/5.1/ directory.
